metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27837 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in GDM in versions prior to 3.38.2.1. A race condition in the handling of session shutdown makes it possible to bypass the lock screen for a user that has autologin enabled, accessing their session without authentication. This is similar to CVE-2017-12164, but requires more difficult conditions to exploit.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> unlikely scenario, requires autologin to be enabled and for a session to crash but then still work. Setting priority to "low"

criterions.comment: gdm3 package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
